standardValue.description: Initial stage where potential leads are identified and approached.
standardValue.label: Prospecting

standardValue.description: Assessing the lead's interest and ability to purchase, confirming the customer’s needs and preferences.
standardValue.label: Qualification

standardValue.description: Engaging with the customer to understand their specific requirements, such as car type, features, and budget.
standardValue.label: Needs Analysis

standardValue.description: Presenting potential car options, pricing, and financing details to the customer.
standardValue.label: Proposal/Price Quote

standardValue.description: Discussing terms and conditions, handling objections, and negotiating price and features.
standardValue.label: Negotiation/Review

standardValue.description: Sending the formal sales contract for the customer’s review and signature.
standardValue.label: Contract Sent

standardValue.description: The deal is confirmed, and the customer agrees to purchase the car. The opportunity transitions to order processing.
standardValue.label: Closed Won

standardValue.description: The opportunity is marked as lost, either due to the customer deciding not to proceed or choosing a different option.
standardValue.label: Closed Lost
